text:
League 1
PSG: the injury of Mauro Icardi unveiled!
Last night in front of Bruges, Paris Saint-Germain striker Mauro Icardi now knows the nature of his injury.
07 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Florian Sermaise



Medical point for Paris Saint-Germain. The day after his victory against Brugge and his qualification to the knockout stages of the Champions League, the club of the capital has made an inventory of its infirmary. Starting with striker Mauro Icardi, touched last night against the Belgians. The Argentine, the only scorer of the game, is suffering from a contusion of the left foot. His condition will be reassessed tomorrow, said the PSG in a statement.





Neymar back in the group next week?




Ander Herrera + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Regarding the other wounded, "Ander Herrera has a small lesion of the left quadriceps and will be unavailable for the game in Brest" this Saturday, the 13th day of Ligue 1. Good news on the other hand with the return to training Neymar, Thomas Meunier and Tilo Kehrer. If the last one has joined the collective training, the first two train individually. The Belgian side should however find the group by the end of the week. For the Brazilian, next week is envisaged.
